page.title: 08MEDIA:Local News
page.content: During the week of June 24th -July 1st the following items about people, places and events in the area studied, appeared in local newspapers. The Brampton Cottage Hospital raised Â£1,000 when they held their Summer Fair. They are going to spend the money on an extention to the hospital. A Brampton teenager was the top student on her course, and will represent the area in a National Nursery Nursing Award Competition. In Brampton some children are having a few unexpected days off school due to the strike action of some teachers in support of their pay claim. A Brampton couple appeared in court charged with a breach of the peace. They attaked each other with a hammer, a bottle and a kettle of boiling water. They were bound to keep the peace for 12 months and find Â£100.
